title: 计算二叉树的深度 (计算二叉树的深度)
content: 思路: // @Title: 计算二叉树的深度 (计算二叉树的深度) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-03-01 20:59:35 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.9 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */ class Solution { public int maxDepth(TreeNode root) { if(root==null){ return 0; } return Math.max(maxDepth(root.left),maxDepth(root.right))+1; } }
